cds::threading::gcc::Manager Class Reference

Thread-specific data manager based on GCC __thread feature. More...

#include <gcc.h>

Static Public Member Functions

static void attachThread ()
 This method must be called in beginning of thread execution.
static void detachThread ()
 This method must be called in end of thread execution.
static gc::hzp_gc::thread_gc & getHZPGC ()
 Returns gc::hzp::ThreadGC object of current thread.

static gc::ptb_gc::thread_gc & getPTBGC ()
 Returns gc::ptb::ThreadGC object of current thread.

Detailed Description

Thread-specific data manager based on GCC __thread feature.

Member Function Documentation

static gc::hrc_gc::thread_gc& cds::threading::gcc::Manager::getHRCGC (  ) [inline, static]

Returns gc::hrc::ThreadGC object of current thread.

The object returned may be uninitialized if you did not call attachThread in the beginning of thread execution or do not use gc::hrc::GarbageCollector. To initialize global gc::hrc::GarbageCollector object you must call cds::gc::hrc::GarbageCollector::Construct() in the beginning of your application

static gc::hzp_gc::thread_gc& cds::threading::gcc::Manager::getHZPGC (  ) [inline, static]

Returns gc::hzp::ThreadGC object of current thread.

The object returned may be uninitialized if you did not call attachThread in the beginning of thread execution or do not use gc::hzp::GarbageCollector. To initialize global gc::hzp::GarbageCollector object you must call cds::gc::hzp::GarbageCollector::Construct() in the beginning of your application

static gc::ptb_gc::thread_gc& cds::threading::gcc::Manager::getPTBGC (  ) [inline, static]

Returns gc::ptb::ThreadGC object of current thread.

The object returned may be uninitialized if you did not call attachThread in the beginning of thread execution or do not use gc::ptb::GarbageCollector. To initialize global cds::gc::ptb::GarbageCollector object you must call cds::gc::ptb::GarbageCollector::Construct() in the beginning of your application
